import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; var idno export default class Edit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { uname: '', email: '', phone: '', txtConformation: '' } } render() { idno = this.props.match.params.idno //this.props->history, location, match console.log(idno) //Destructuring.... var {uname,email,phone,txtConformation}=this.state return (<>

EDIT COMPONENT PAGE

GOTO BACK
) } componentDidMount() { const url=`http://localhost:3003/user/${idno}` axios.get(url).then((result) => this.setState(result.data)); } }
